title: I got my Mindset, Hyon Chu!
description:
With a conversation with PVK in the can, I wanted to have something recent on the channel for anyone he sends over. Here's some 3rd Lobe cognition commentary on Hyon Chu's appearance on the PVK show (reportedly recorded Oct 27, 2021)

Main Source:  /watch?v=ozhcpLrJsB8

Shadow Matriarchy II:  /watch?v=cPSThiEIFAs
Turbo Weapons:  /watch?v=rWAEq7TInO0
Chad & Griz:  /watch?v=ydZnp_nN1Qg
Grail Country:  /watch?v=91mfVKa8xsE
PVK Frame Problem:  /watch?v=W4kFnshkORY
JBP on Christ:  /watch?v=N-8slOBngqk
Bathroom:  /watch?v=BhuiPtwyoY8
Residual Self:  /watch?v=t-Nz6us7DUA
Tom with the Weather:  /watch?v=oi2RdAgSS2k
Peterson in Filth I:  /watch?v=Htp44553lqY
Peterson in Filth II:  /watch?v=zPByk7boU4A
Apartment Torch:  /watch?v=BQ4-tU7y7J4
Tyler's Vision:  /watch?v=HZMUGlFI_tg
Morgoth's Heat:  /watch?v=Qc3pyR3ddWU
Moloch:  /watch?v=SeohwQls2GE
Bio-Libertarianism:  /watch?v=Nb1UTTa3THA







Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/W8tnFw5t9p
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
